channel.title: The game lag at second game
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a performance issue, the first game is normal, but at the second game I get like 5 FPS. I have to restart the game every new game to avoid this problem. I play in windowed on intel + nvidia laptop, nvidia used forced.
Best regards.

item.title: The game lag at second game
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
@í42-Xblade Should have a look just in case.

Read full topic

item.description:
same this, now lagging.

Another information about this bug is the game in trial the game use 15% : https://tsukasagenesis.tinytake.com/sf/MzQ4Mjk1MV8xMDQ0NDk5Ng

the second game, it use 75% … https://tsukasagenesis.tinytake.com/sf/MzQ4Mjk4Ml8xMDQ0NTEyNw

there is definitely a bug somewhere
best regards.

item.title: The game lag at second game
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Might be related to windows 10 update issues again.

See if any of these fixes your problem: http://blog.drivethelife.com/windows-10/fps-drops-games-windows-10-update.html

Read full topic
